p:
To confirm that baicalein and the crude extract inhibit viral replication by directly targeting SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro in cells, we tested their anti-SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro activity under complex cell environment. As the expression of SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro is toxic to mammalian cells
36 , we used the mixture of HEK293T cell lysate and purified SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro for the test. Both baicalein and the crude extract showed inhibition activity under this condition (
Figure S2 ).
